nodes.text: The Regency Worlds were a group of planets in Arkanis sector that held economic control of trade along the Corellian Run near its intersection with the Triellus Trade Route, as well as Hutt-dominated economics spinward of Kemal Station. Settled circa 4200 BBY by pilgrims from the Core World of Ator, few colonies in the region survived after communication with the Republic ceased. The worlds that did endure formed a small empire, known as the Arkanis Regency.
The Regency world systems were Arkanis, Issor (containing the worlds Issor, Cadezia, and Trulalis), New Ator, Vasch, and Huldamun. The only ruler known from the Regency was Empress Teeda.
